Articles.Content: About that thread, ascen said 'you can try raidions roleplay though' what is this radions roleplay?
It is not compatible with most computers; you have to delete system 32.

It is not compatible with most computers; you have to delete system 32.

Legit

I am Radion Spaceworks, the Radion of 'Radion\'s roleplay.' What you do not know is that I am currently creating a roleplay forum to replace the one that existed here on these forums prior to the creation of the Fan Art board. It\'s a clean slate, completely unrelated history-wise to the old RP board, and will hopefully survive better than the one here. However, one cannot just walk in. As one of the ways I intend to keep the RP forum as good and professional as possible, one wishing to enter into roleplay must first pass the admission test, which judges English skills (requiring at least median knowledge of the subject), creativity, and Political theory.

So um, how do i enter?

The site will be up sometime today or tomorrow. In addition, you must take a test before you RP. The test is difficult; it makes building a ten thousand part space station look easy.

I am Radion Spaceworks, the Radion of 'Radion\'s roleplay.' What you do not know is that I am currently creating a roleplay forum to replace the one that existed here on these forums prior to the creation of the Fan Art board. It\'s a clean slate, completely unrelated history-wise to the old RP board, and will hopefully survive better than the one here. However, one cannot just walk in. As one of the ways I intend to keep the RP forum as good and professional as possible, one wishing to enter into roleplay must first pass the admission test, which judges English skills (requiring at least median knowledge of the subject), creativity, and Political theory.

That\'s extremely esoteric and elitist.

I like it!
